author: timbeiko
content:
Announcing this a bit earlier than usual given many people will be OOO on Thursday, but we still have ACDE this week: Nov 23, 14 UTC ðŸ˜„ ! 

**Agenda: https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/901** 
Stream: https://youtube.com/live/_by0UBqrYng 
Zoom will be shared here before the call. 

**If no one on your team can make it, please provide an async update on the agenda!**

At the very least, it'd be good to hear from teams about (1) their readiness for devnet-12, and (2) how long they think client teams should keep running validators on Goerli post-Dencun.  

If we don't plan to fork Goerli before EOY, then I think we should have a blog post announcing its shutdown ðŸ”œ . If we do want to fork Goerli this year, then we'll need to put that info in the fork announcement anyways ðŸ˜… ! 

Happy thanksgiving to folks in the USA ðŸ¦ƒ
